## DOMContainer.handleContextRequests() method

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Instructs this particular Container to handle W3C Community Context requests that propagate to its associated DOM node.

**Signature:**

```typescript
handleContextRequests(enable: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

enable


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

true to enable context requests handling; false otherwise.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
